sentences.sContent: I don’t want to sound like a snob, but I thought she was vulgar.
sentences.sCn: 我不想像个势利小人，但我觉得她就是庸俗。

synos.tran: 势利小人，势利眼；假内行

remMethod.val: 参考snobbery(n. 势利态度， 自命不凡)

words.tran: 势利，谄上欺下；摆绅士架子；势利的行为或语言

trans.tranOther: someone who thinks they are better than people from a lower social class – used to show disapproval
